introduction: In this series - a ground-breaking blend of True Crime and Historical documentary, we will vigorously present the case against six formidable Kings who have left an indelible mark on the world.Then we reveal the haunting mitigating factors and introduce conflicting and fresh evidence ultimately leading to potentially new verdicts concerning these enigmatic men.EPISODE 1: IVAN THE TERRIBLEEPISODE 2: BAD KING JOHN IEPISODE 3: HENRY VIIIEPISODE 4: KING HEROD THE GREATEPISODE 5: EMPEROR GAIUS (CALIGULA)EPISODE 6: EMPEROR NEROPRODUCED BYFirstLook TV
